Title: Thailand’s PTT issues tender to buy February to April LNG cargoes
Description: Thailand’s state-owned PTT has issued a tender to buy an unspecified number of cargoes for delivery across February to April to its 11.5 mtpa May Ta Phut LNG terminal in Thailand’s southern Rayong province, The tender closes on Jan. 26.
Author: CK

Title: China's Sinopec may offer LNG cargoes unsold from recent tender
Description: China’s state-owned Sinopec may enter into bilateral discussions to sell the unsold cargoes from its recently closed tender for up to 45 LNG cargoes for delivery between February and October.
Author: CK
